title: Bobby And Caitlin’s Weekend With Bear Grylls + We Draft ‘Celebs You’d Bring Back From The Dead’ + Bobby's Santa Deal With Eddie
itunes:title: Bobby And Caitlin’s Weekend With Bear Grylls + We Draft ‘Celebs You’d Bring Back From The Dead’ + Bobby's Santa Deal With Eddie
description:
Bobby talks about the crazy adventure he went on over the weekend with his fiancé Caitlin while filming an episode of Running Wild with Bear Grylls. At least what he can say until it airs… We have a Bobby Bones Show draft on celebrities we’d bring back to life. Eddie updates us that his blow up inflatable Santa is still up and one his neighbors isn’t happy about it …so Bobby offers him a deal to keep it up until the end of NEXT month. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
